Literature.Title: Novel-designed antimicrobial peptides with dual antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory actions against Cutibacterium acnes for acne vulgaris therapy
Literature.Author: Kim H, Jang JH, Kim HR, Cho JH

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:28.5% Hemolysis=64 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:20% Cytotoxicity=64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Cutibacterium acnes KCTC 3314(MIC=2µM),Cutibacterium acnes KCTC 5012(MIC=2µM),Cutibacterium acnes CCARM 9009(MIC=2µM),Cutibacterium acnes CCARM 9010(MIC=2µM),Cutibacterium acnes CCARM 9169(MIC=2µM)
